title: Riot really needs to go back and finish Mordekaiser's skins...
body:
After seeing Pantheon's VGU, and how he got lines/effects on most of his skins... Why does Morde get nothing but half done VFX on most of his skins and no unique voice lines or recalls? It doesn't matter if he doesn't sell skins, in fact, it's more important for him to get VFX if this is the case, since riot will likely never make new Morde skins. I don't see why my champ, who has been shafted since his release in season 1, has to get a half-assed VGU while every champ around him gets the works. 

There is 0 reason why Pentakill and Lord Mordekaiser should not have full unique VFX treatment and recalls.
